Name: Turoa
Description: Ski slopes for all abilities on the side of Mount Ruapehu, the highest mountain on the North Island.

Name: Mt Hutt
Description: Snow-capped 7,185-foot peak & top winter sports resort with lifts, jumps & runs for all abilities.

Name: The Remarkables
Description: Offering hiking & skiing at 7 parks, this snowcapped mountain range runs north to south
